summary: Implemented Run Monitor IA and behavior updates in public UI: summary-first timeline rows with payload toggles, load-more event pagination, active step/next-action derivation, pause/resume live updates with manual sync, and incremental DOM patching that preserves selection, scroll, and focus without changing server contracts.
issues: Unable to run full test suite in this sandbox: `npm test` fails because `vitest` is not installed in the runtime.
Unable to run live server smoke test in this sandbox: local listen blocked with EPERM on 127.0.0.1.
